item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-18
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• If you send a comic submission my way, please don't automatically sign me up to your newsletter without my permission. Not cool. #
  • Went to and bought a shirt @ Rogues Gallery today! I'm such a clothing nerd. #
  • I'm at Hugo's. #
  • I'm at Pomegranate Inn (49 Neal St., Portland). #
  • I'm at LL Bean (Route 1, Freeport). #
  • Urban Outfitters is offering a great new denim option:... #
  • I'm at Duck Fat (43 Middle St., Portland). #
  • Incoming! #

Powered by Twitter Tools
